egui::ctrl::copy_events

egui::ctrl::copy_events< base > Struct Template Reference

template<class window>
 copy_events (window *w)

Detailed Description

template<class base>
struct egui::ctrl::copy_events< base >

helper to make sure the event handlers from the base class match those from the derived class

For instance wnd<animate_ctrl> a = ...; wnd<> w = a;

a->events.on_timer must point to the same handlers as w->events.on_timer
